<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Archer Sentry](/NPCs.aspx?ID=934)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Archer sentries slightly outrank the rank-and-file guards, taking positions on walls, garrisons, and other important locations where they can stay out of the fray and pick off criminals or assailants.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Archer Sentry](/NPCs.aspx?ID=934)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 233</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (100 arrows), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Signal Whistle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=50)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +10 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 piercing

**Sentry's Aim** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The archer sentry aims carefully and fires. They make a ranged weapon Strike with a +1 circumstance bonus. The Strike ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition, [lesser cover, and standard cover, and reduces greater cover to standard cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459).

</column>
